mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BASE_CATEGORY(BOX_NO, CATE_NAME1, CATE_NAME2, CATE_NAME3, CATE_NAME4, CATE_NAME5) VALUES (#{box_no}, #{cate_name1}, #{cate_name2}, #{cate_name3},#{cate_name4}, #{cate_name5})
mapper.update: UPDATE BASE_CATEGORY SET CATE_NAME1 = #{cate_name1}, CATE_NAME2 = #{cate_name2}, CATE_NAME3 = #{cate_name3}, CATE_NAME4 = #{cate_name4}, CATE_NAME5 = #{cate_name5} WHERE CATEGORY_NO = #{category_no}

UPDATE CATEGORY c SET c.cate_detail1 = (SELECT b.cate_name1 from base_category b where c.category_no = b.category_no and c.cate_detail1 is not null), c.cate_detail2 = (SELECT b.cate_name2 from base_category b where c.category_no = b.category_no and c.cate_detail2 is not null), c.cate_detail3 = (SELECT b.cate_name3 from base_category b where c.category_no = b.category_no and c.cate_detail3 is not null), c.cate_detail4 = (SELECT b.cate_name4 from base_category b where c.category_no = b.category_no and c.cate_detail4 is not null), c.cate_detail5 = (SELECT b.cate_name5 from base_category b where c.category_no = b.category_no and c.cate_detail5 is not null)
